articles.author: Geoffrey A. Fowler
articles.title: Column | Zuckerberg fired the fact-checkers. We tested their replacement. - The Washington Post
articles.description: Our tech columnist drafted 65 community notes, Meta’s new crowdsourced system to fight falsehoods. It failed to make a dent.
articles.content: When a hoax about Donald Trump went viral at the funeral of Pope Francis, I went on social media to try to set the record straight. Im a volunteer for community notes, a program Mark Zuckerberg annou… [+8511 chars]

articles.title: Apple Is Reportedly Exploring Bringing Tandem OLED Technology To iPhones, The Same Displays Currently Used On The M4 iPad Pro Lineup; Implementation Might Not Happen Before 2028 - Wccftech
articles.description: Tandem OLED currently only exists on the iPad Pro models, but a new report states that Apple is thinking about bringing this technology to the iPhone
articles.content: The iPhone 17 family launching later this year might feature LTPO OLEDs, giving them access to high refresh rates, but there is still a ton of underlying technology that has yet to arrive to these de… [+1965 chars]

articles.author: Anthony Ha
articles.title: Apple might be building its own AI ‘answer engine’ - TechCrunch
articles.description: Apple is reportedly working to create a lightweight competitor to ChatGPT.
articles.content:
Apple has formed a new team to build a ChatGPT-like app, according to according to Bloombergs Mark Gurman.
This team reportedly called Answers, Knowledge, and Information is working to build an answ… [+614 chars]
